Seo.title: Amine Ifakkir | Full-Stack Java & Angular Developer | Germany & Morocco
Seo.description: Amine Ifakkir is a full-stack Java and Angular developer specializing in Spring Boot, microservices, and cloud-native solutions. Available for projects in Germany and Morocco. Expert in enterprise Java development, REST APIs, and modern web applications.

hero.title: Java & Angular Developer | Available in Germany & Morocco
hero.subtitle: Expert full-stack developer specializing in Java, Spring Boot, and Angular. Building enterprise applications, microservices, and modern web solutions for clients worldwide.
Banner.Description: I am a full-stack Java and Angular developer with 3+ years of experience building enterprise-grade applications, microservices, and RESTful APIs. Specializing in Spring Boot and Angular, I deliver scalable, cloud-native solutions for clients in Germany and Morocco. Available for freelance projects and remote collaboration.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I'm a full-stack Java & Angular developer with expertise in building enterprise-grade applications and scalable web solutions. Available for projects in Germany and Morocco, I specialize in delivering high-quality software for clients worldwide.

My backend expertise includes developing Spring Boot microservices, designing RESTful APIs, optimizing database performance with PostgreSQL and MongoDB, and implementing cloud-native solutions on AWS and Azure.

On the frontend, I build modern Angular applications with RxJS, TypeScript, and responsive design principles. I focus on creating intuitive user experiences while maintaining clean, maintainable code.

With experience in DevOps practices including Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines, I ensure reliable deployments and scalable architectures. I'm passionate about writing clean code, following best practices, and continuously learning new technologies.

TechStack.Title: Tech Stack
TechStack.Subtitle: Technology choices that let me move fast without breaking reliability.

Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full-Stack Developer
Description: Developed and maintained web applications, RESTful APIs, and microservices using Spring Boot and Angular.
Optimized system performance by implementing caching, asynchronous processing, and database indexing.
Implemented security measures to protect data integrity and user privacy.
Utilized continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines to automate testing and deployment processes.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
Participated in code reviews, pair programming, and knowledge sharing sessions to enhance team performance.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Freelancer
Description: Implementing continuous improvements across both frontend and backend systems, focusing on performance optimization and code quality.
Developing scalable and robust platforms using Spring Boot and Angular, utilizing functional, reactive, and object-oriented programming paradigms.
Automating processes through efficient data structures and enhancing workflow productivity.
Collaborating with clients to understand their requirements and deliver customized solutions.
Integrating third-party APIs and services to expand platform capabilities.
Ensuring the use of best practices in software development, including version control, testing, and deployment.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Gisselle
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Web application for internal company management that covers sales, collection, and tracking departments, very extensive and complex with various functions made in Angular and Laravel. It works with websockets, schedules, laravel jobs, integrations with WordPress, Zadarma, LiveConnect, etc.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Emelteciot
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application for data query, made with Angular and Laravel. The chart.js library is applied.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Vas Aviation
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Application for tracking fuel supply requests for aircraft. It has an email module, real-time notifications, CSV file handling for data import, price quotes. Developed in Angular and Laravel.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: GlobalJobs
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: E-learning platform developed with WordPress. Fully customized design, with plugins developed from scratch. It has a customized payment module, virtual classroom, course tracking dashboard.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: GlobalJobs
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: E-commerce platform for technology products. Developed with WordPress and implementing a shipping system for products. It has sales reporting through customized programming.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Agrourbana
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application made from scratch with an auth module, configurable graphs, configurable alarms, and user management. It also has logic for reactive forms for parameter configuration.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Tu Super Plan
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Health plans quote that has an advanced search engine. The plans are shown based on the user's age, monthly income, and location. It has a live chat, contact form, notification system via WhatsApp and email, auth, and information management through the admin role.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Proyexiot
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Data monitoring platform for water wells, tugboats, and various installations made from scratch with an auth module, configurable graphs, configurable alarms, user management, and geolocation with openlayers. It also has logic for reactive forms for parameter configuration.

OtherProjects.Title: More Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Appliance
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Created an application for managing and monitoring appliances and hardware systems. This project included integration with third-party APIs and data visualization tools for tracking appliance performance.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: RE Front OffreOnline
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A front-end project designed to enhance the user experience for an online offer management system. Developed the interface using Angular, focusing on responsiveness and user-friendly navigation.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: DPPI-GC
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Developed an application for general coordination and project management. Utilized Spring Boot and Angular to create a system that allows seamless collaboration between teams and real-time project tracking.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: DPPI-FON
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Worked on a platform focused on functional operations and management. Involved backend development with Spring Boot and frontend with Angular, ensuring smooth data flow and functional integration.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: SDR
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Built a solution supporting sales and business development teams by automating processes and providing real-time analytics. Implemented using Spring Boot and Angular for both backend and frontend development.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: CRM System
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Developed a CRM system with features such as lead management, customer tracking, and reporting. Built with Spring Boot and Angular, the system provides businesses with an efficient way to manage customer interactions.

contact.title: Say Hi!
contact.content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
